item.0: A man's sense of true fulfillment is deeply rooted in him being loved by a woman.
item.1: Some women, while advocating for 'equality,' may actually be aiming for preferential treatment, like preferential hiring.
item.2: In times of crisis, women's survival should not always be prioritized over men's.
item.3: Harmless comments or actions are perceived by many women as expressions of sexism.
item.4: Women have a tendency to be too quick to take offense.
item.5: Happiness and fulfillment can be achieved without the need for a romantic partnership with the opposite sex.
item.6: Feminists are not aiming for women to dominate men.
item.7: Many women possess a degree of moral innocence that is relatively rare among men.
item.8: Men should provide a safe and nurturing environment for women.
item.9: Almost all women under value everything that is done for them by men.
item.10: Women often dominate men to gain influence.
item.11: A man should  have a special woman to love.
item.12: Men do not need women to be whole.
item.13: Women tend to dramatize the professional issues they face.
item.14: Once a woman has drawn a man in, she often becomes possessive and controlling.
item.15: When a man wins in a competition against a woman, she often attributes her loss to unfair circumstances.
item.16: A worthy woman should be cherished and worshiped by her partner.
item.17: It is fairly uncommon for women to enjoy leading men on sexually.
item.18: In comparison to men, women have a heightened sense of moral awareness.
item.19: Men should put the financial needs of the women in their circle before their own happiness and comfort.
item.20: What feminists are demanding of men is completely fair and justified.
item.21: Compared to men, women generally have a more sophisticated feeling for social intuition and culture.
